entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 12:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -23.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
